description:
Yufuin`s inspiration leads the Defense Club decides to go on a training camp to the ocean on . Meanwhile, the three student council members head to a beach resort in a limousine. The beach has bright sun and white sand, but there`s something a little off about it. A strange feeling starts hovering around the group`s members...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai to Gasshuku to Ha Brush
